attributes.action: Ticket Touting to be made illegal!
attributes.additional_details:
Unfair selling of tickets at extortionate prices should be made illegal!
Ever wanted to go to a concert or event & the tickets sell out instantly, yet you find out that they are being sold triple the face value on sites such as eBay & Seatwave?
Share this petition to as many people possible so there can be a potential law against ticket touting!
